#Text=Ty Lee says : " What are you doing ? "
#Text=Zuko says : " What does it look like I 'm doing ? "
#Text=Ty Lee says : " But , it 's a painting of your family . "
#Text=Zuko says : " You think I care ? "
#Text=Ty Lee says : " I think you do . "
#Text=Zuko says : " You do n't know me , so why do n't you just mind your own business ? "
#Text=Ty Lee says : " I know you . "
#Text=Zuko says : " No , you do n't .

#Text=You 're stuck in your little  Ty Lee world " where everything 's great all the time .

column1: #Text=" Mai says : " Zuko , leave her alone .
#Text=" Zuko says : " " I 'm so pretty .
#Text=Ty Lee says : " Yes , I 'm a circus freak .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " Do you have any idea what my home life was like ?
#Text=Growing up with six sisters who look exactly like me ?
#Text=It was like I did n't even have my own name .
#Text=I joined the circus because I was scared of spending the rest of my life as part of a matched set .
#Text=At least I 'm different now .
#Text=" Circus freak " is a compliment .
#Text=" Mai says : " Guess that explains why you need ten boyfriends , too .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " I 'm sorry , what ?
#Text=" Mai says : " Attention issues .
#Text=You could n't get enough attention when you were a kid , so you 're trying to make up for it now .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " Well , what 's your excuse , Mai ?
#Text=You were an only child for fifteen years , but even with all that attention , your aura is this dingy , pasty , gray ... " Mai says : " I do n't believe in auras .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Yeah , you do not believe in anything .
#Text=" Mai says : " Oh , well , I 'm sorry I ca n't be as high - strung and crazy as the rest of you .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I 'm sorry , too .
#Text=I wish you would be high - strung and crazy for once instead of keeping all your feeling bottled up inside .
#Text=She just called your aura dingy .
#Text=Are you gon na take that ?
#Text=" Mai says : " What do you want from me ?
#Text=You want a teary confession about how hard my childhood was ?
#Text=Well , it was n't .
#Text=I was a rich only child who got anything I wanted ... as long as I behaved and sat still , and did n't speak unless spoken to .
#Text=My mother said I had to keep out of trouble .
#Text=We had my dad 's political career to think about .
#Text=" Azula says : " Well , that 's it , then .
#Text=You have a controlling mother who had certain expectations , and if you strayed from them , you were shut down .
#Text=That 's why you 're afraid to care about anything , and why you ca n't express yourself .
#Text=" Mai says : " You want me to express myself ?
#Text=Leave me alone !
#Text=" Zuko says : " I like it when you express yourself .
#Text=" Mai says : " Do n't touch me !
#Text=I 'm still mad at you .
#Text=" Zuko says : " My life has n't been that easy either , Mai .
#Text=" Mai says : " Whatever .
#Text=That does n't excuse the way you 've been acting .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " Calm down , you guys .
#Text=This much negative energy is bad for your skin .
#Text=You 'll totally break out .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Bad skin ?
#Text=Normal teenagers worry about bad skin .
#Text=I do n't have that luxury .
#Text=My father decided to teach me a permanent lesson on my face !
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " Sorry , Zuko , I ... " Zuko says : " For so long I thought that if my dad accepted me , I 'd be happy .
#Text=I 'm back home now , my dad talks to me .
#Text=Ha !
#Text=He even thinks I 'm a hero .
#Text=Everything should be perfect , right ?
#Text=I should be happy now , but I 'm not .
#Text=I 'm angrier than ever and I do n't know why !
#Text=" Azula says : " There 's a simple question you need to answer , then .
#Text=Who are you angry at ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " No one .
#Text=I 'm just angry .
#Text=" Mai says : " Yeah , who are you angry at , Zuko ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Everyone .
#Text=I do n't know .
#Text=" Azula says : " Is it Dad ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " No , no .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " Your uncle ?
#Text=" Azula says : " Me ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " No , no , n - no , no !
#Text=" Mai says : " Then who ?
#Text=Who are you angry at ?
#Text=" Azula says : " Answer the question , Zuko .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " Talk to us .
#Text=" Mai says : " Come on , answer the question .
#Text=" Azula says : " Come on , answer it .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I 'm angry at myself !
#Text=" Azula says : " Why ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Because I 'm confused .
#Text=Because I 'm not sure I know the difference between right and wrong anymore .
#Text=" Azula says : " You 're pathetic .
#Text=" Mai says : " I know one thing I care about .
#Text=I care about you .
#Text=" Azula says : " Well , those were wonderful performances , everyone .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I guess you would n't understand , would you , Azula ?
#Text=Because you 're just so perfect .
#Text=" Azula says : " Well , yes , I guess you 're right .
#Text=I do n't have sob stories like all of you .
#Text=I could sit here and complain how our mom liked Zuko more than me , but I do n't really care .
#Text=My own mother thought I was a monster .
#Text=She was right , of course , but it still hurt .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " What Lo and Li said came true .
#Text=The beach did help us learn about ourselves .
#Text=I feel all smoothed .
#Text=I 'll always remember this .
#Text=" Azula says : " You know what would make this trip really memorable ?
#Text="
